author: Paul Rankin
method: For the carbonara, fry the bacon in a saucepan for two minutes until crisp and add the cream. Cook for a further two minutes. Add the blue cheese to the sauce to melt, and then add the pasta and serve.
ingredients: 4 slices bacon, cut into thin strips,  100ml3½fl oz double cream ,  75g/2¾oz blue cheese,  100g/3½oz pasta, cooked (such as tagliatelle)
